short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortcut2Url gives you 4 keyboard shortcuts for your favorite sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your favorites are at your fingertips! Upon installation, you'll be presented with Shortcut2Url options page where you can add and edit your shortcut-link pairs. 

There are two modes: focusing on the tab that already exists and always opening a new one.

Four shortcuts is limitation set by Chrome. Though it's rather enough for your most frequently used sites.

You can change your keyboard shortcuts by visiting 'chrome://extensions/shortcuts'.
